apiDocs.title: API Documentation
apiDocs.subtitle: Integrate EverSaid's transcription, cleanup, and analysis capabilities into your application. RESTful API with JSON responses.

quickStart.title: Quick Start
quickStart.description: The EverSaid API provides speech-to-text transcription with AI-powered cleanup and analysis. All responses are JSON.
quickStart.versioningDescription: We use semantic versioning and will maintain backward compatibility within major versions.
quickStart.responseDescription: All responses return JSON with appropriate HTTP status codes:
quickStart.publicEndpointsNote: Three endpoints require no authentication. Use them to explore available models, languages, and analysis profiles before signing up.

auth.title: Authentication
auth.description: The API uses JWT (JSON Web Token) bearer authentication. You must register an account, login to receive tokens, and include the access token in all authenticated requests.
auth.tokenSecurityNote: Store tokens securely. Never expose them in client-side code or version control. Access tokens expire after 30 minutes; refresh tokens expire after 7 days.

options.title: Options
options.description: Get available transcription and LLM options including providers, models, and parameter constraints. Use this to build dynamic configuration UIs.
options.noAuthNote: This endpoint is publicly accessible. Try it now to see available models and providers.
options.returns: Returns unified options for both transcription and LLM services, including available providers, models, and parameters with their constraints.

languages.title: Languages
languages.description: List supported transcription languages with accuracy tiers. ElevenLabs Scribe V1 supports 99+ languages with Word Error Rate (WER) data.
languages.returns: Returns list of supported languages with BCP-47 codes and accuracy information.

analysisProfiles.title: Analysis Profiles
analysisProfiles.description: Get available analysis profiles (summary, action items, reflection, etc.). Each profile extracts different insights from cleaned transcripts.
analysisProfiles.returns: Returns available analysis profiles with their IDs, names, and what they extract.

upload.title: Upload
upload.description: Upload audio files for transcription. We offer three endpoints depending on how much processing you want in a single request.
upload.recommendedDesc: Upload, transcribe, and cleanup in one request. This is the recommended approach for most use cases.
upload.completeDesc: Upload audio, transcribe with speaker diarization, and clean with LLM in a single request. Optionally trigger analysis.
upload.uploadOnly: Upload audio file only. Use this when you want to manually trigger transcription later.
upload.uploadAndTranscribe: Upload and start transcription. Use this when you want to manually trigger cleanup later.

entries.title: Entries
entries.description: Manage voice entries (uploaded audio files). Each entry can have multiple transcriptions and cleaned versions.
entries.listDesc: List all voice entries for the authenticated user, ordered by newest first.
entries.getDesc: GET detailed metadata for a specific voice entry including primary transcription.
entries.getAudioDesc: Download the audio file for a voice entry. Returns preprocessed WAV format.
entries.deleteDesc: Permanently delete a voice entry and all associated data (transcriptions, cleaned entries, audio file).

transcription.title: Transcription
transcription.description: Manage transcriptions with speaker diarization. Poll transcription status until complete, then retrieve the text and segments.
transcription.startDesc: Start background transcription for an uploaded audio file. Supports speaker diarization (1-10 speakers).
transcription.getStatusDesc: Get transcription status and result. Poll this endpoint until status is "completed" or "failed".
transcription.listDesc: List all transcription attempts for an entry. Useful when re-transcribing with different settings.
transcription.setPrimaryDesc: Mark a transcription as the primary one to display for its entry.

cleanup.title: Cleanup
cleanup.description: LLM-powered text cleanup removes filler words, fixes grammar, and formats transcriptions. Supports user edits with revert capability.
cleanup.startDesc: Start LLM cleanup on a completed transcription. Returns immediately with cleanup ID.
cleanup.getStatusDesc: Get cleaned entry details including the LLM-processed text and any user edits.
cleanup.userEditsDesc: Users can edit the cleaned text while preserving the original AI output for revert.
cleanup.saveEdit: Save user-edited text. The original AI-generated text is preserved for revert.
cleanup.revertEdit: Revert to AI-generated cleanup by clearing user edits.

analysis.title: Analysis
analysis.description: Run AI analysis on cleaned transcripts using different profiles (summary, action items, reflection).
analysis.startAnalysis: Start analysis on a cleaned entry using the specified profile. Processes in background.
analysis.getAnalysis: Get analysis results. Poll until status is "completed" or "failed".

workflow.title: Complete Workflow
workflow.description: This example shows the full flow: upload, poll for completion, and retrieve results.

polling.title: Polling Pattern
polling.description: Transcription, cleanup, and analysis run asynchronously. Poll the status endpoints until processing completes.
polling.intervalNote: Poll every 2-3 seconds. Most transcriptions complete within 30 seconds. Cleanup and analysis complete within 10 seconds each.

readyToIntegrate.title: Ready to integrate?
readyToIntegrate.subtitle: Join the waitlist to get API access and start building.

metadata.title: EverSaid | Smart transcription. AI listens. You decide.
metadata.description: AI-powered cleanup you can review, refine, and trust. See every edit. Verify against the original audio.
